ctx: intros Q p q H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (reduceplus_mults A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q H1 H2).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) H1 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q H2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM p The term "Q" has type "list (poly A0 eqA ltM)" while it is expected to have type "OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)".

original: intros Q p q H1 H2. apply (reduceplus_mults A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q H1 H2).
